title: Nintendo Switch OLED Model Announced - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.06.21
description:
Greg and Gary Whitta delve DEEP into the new Nintendo Switch (OLED Version), PlayStation's next State of Play, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:05:00 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO is live. Blessing, Janet, and I talk about PlayStation striking back and they review Chicory!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:07:00 - New Nintendo Switch Announced and People are Pissed
00:15:23 - What's the use case for the Switch Lite? - Best Friends Q:KBABZ
00:26:10 - Were the Bloomberg reports completely malarkey? - Best Friends Q:BanderSN
00:32:20 - final nail in the coffin - Best Friends Q:JoshyG
 - State of Play coming Thursday
 - Pokemon Go is a “Dream Come True” according to Miyamoto, By Cameron Koch @ GameSpot
 - Final Fantasy 14 Has Broken Its Concurrent Player Record On Steam Once Again, Darryn Bonthuys @ GameSpot
 - Out today
- Squad Up:Parker Begale(Xbox:Sea of Thieves) - thebeagal8
 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
